text: Desperately Seeking Susan is a 1985 American comedy-drama movie directed by Susan Seidelman and starring Madonna, Rosanna Arquette, John Turturro, Laurie Metcalf, Aidan Quinn, Steven Wright, Will Patton, Robert Joy, Giancarlo Esposito, Mark Blum. It was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1985 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Susan Seidelman Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in New Jersey
title: Desperately Seeking Susan
